displayName.text: BCCO NYC : Same Day / Rush Custom Printed T-shirts NYC

authorAttributions.displayName: BCCO NYC : Same Day / Rush Custom Printed T-shirts NYC
BCCO NYC : Same Day / Rush Custom Printed T-shirts NYC

adrFormatAddress: 1697 Broadway #302, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text:
I've worked with BCCO many times. Every single order is handled with creativity and impeccable customer service. My orders have been delivered quickly and with high quality results that clearly reflect my vision. I've had multiple types of projects made including the hat in the pic

Their website is interactive and allows me to try out different ideas and see how it will affect the final price.

originalText.text: BCCO NYC was amazing when it came to my same day order for my birthday shirt. The designer helped me create it and let me select a different color for each side. Once the order was placed, I got it that same day. The shirt came out well and completed my birthday outfit. Thank you.

text.text: BCCO NYC was amazing when it came to my same day order for my birthday shirt. The designer helped me create it and let me select a different color for each side. Once the order was placed, I got it that same day. The shirt came out well and completed my birthday outfit. Thank you.

originalText.text:
Paid $77.76 upfront to have embroidered letters done. I gave them a denim cap and a reference image -- I got clear assurance from the manager and another employee that a replica of the hat in the image would be made in the same style (font & size etc). The picture on the right is the completed work given to me 10 days after I placed & paid for my order. Unbelievably bad!!!

They took 10 days and $77 for stitching that a child could do. After I expressed my disappointment at the quality of their work, they said they'd charge me to remove the embroidery.

I hope no one else gets scammed by these amateurs, but I doubt they'll be in business in this city (in the Garment District, no less) much longer.

originalText.text: BCCO was really wonderful to work with. I asked for a shirt with a cartoon based on a photo of my pet turtle, and they designed and printed it within a couple days. The shirts came out great. Customer service was very responsive and really went above and beyond to help me out.  I can't recommend these guys enough.

text.text: BCCO was really wonderful to work with. I asked for a shirt with a cartoon based on a photo of my pet turtle, and they designed and printed it within a couple days. The shirts came out great. Customer service was very responsive and really went above and beyond to help me out.  I can't recommend these guys enough.

originalText.text: I work for a luxury event company, and as a person who works with different vendors regularly, it is sometimes difficult to gauge who will be your partner and ensure, that not only they produce an outstanding project, but in a timely manner.  Well, BCCO NY became that vendor for us.  We have used them a few times since our initial contact, and will continue to use them. They are efficient, patient and willing to do what needs to be done to get the project completed.  Their level of communication is above par.  Not once were we "surprised."  Any issues, or concerns were communicated along the way.  Our experience with BCCO NYC is unmatched and we appreciate everything they've done for us thus far.  I highly recommend their service to anyone looking for a quality, embroidery/print shop!  And a special shout out to Fin, who has been our main POC from day 1.  Thank you!!
